name: Household Hazardous Waste Collection Event
materials: Antifreeze; Ni-Cd Batteries; Other Batteries; Unused Paint; Batteries (Rechargeable); Alkaline/Single-Use Batteries; Used Motor Oil; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Computer Peripherals; Tablets; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
Collection Centers
In addition to mobile events, permanent collection centers are located across the metro area. Contact the Kansas City facility at (816) 513-8400 Address: 4707 Deramus St., KC, MO.Hours: Thursday-Friday 9-6, Saturday 9-4, No Appointment Required. 
The Lee's Summit facility, which is open April through November on the first Saturday of the month (except on holidays), can be contacted at (816) 969-1805 Address: 2101 SE Hamblen Rd., Lee's Summit, MO  Appointment required.  Paint Only on 3rd Wednesday's of the month, year-round.
